column3:
4-digit year of stop time for forward DFI 
integration

2-digit month of stop time for forward DFI 
integration

2-digit day of stop time for forward DFI 
integration

2-digit hour of stop time for forward DFI 
integration

2-digit minute of stop time for forward DFI 
integration

2-digit second of stop time for forward DFI 
integration

Option for radar data assimilation:

=0 : sets hydrometeors to 0 and lets 
them spin up in DFI

=1 : keeps hydrometeors unchanged
